image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

milestones.description: Khaled Mashud and Al Sahariar's 123-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 6th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 69 between Minhajul Abedin and Naimur Rahman
Aminul Islam has broken the record for most ducks (4) in ODIs for BAN, going past Shahriar Hossain's 3
This is the highest match aggregate (511) involving teams West Indies & Bangladesh in ODIs
Aminul Islam has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (32) for BAN, going past Akram Khan

stories.title: West Indies defeat Bangladesh by 73 runs in first ODI
stories.summary: Minnows Bangladesh experienced a 73 runs defeat to test elite West Indies in the first of the two-match ODI series at floodlit Bangabandhu National Stadium Friday

recentReportStory.title: West Indies defeat Bangladesh by 73 runs in first ODI
recentReportStory.summary: Minnows Bangladesh experienced a 73 runs defeat to test elite West Indies in the first of the two-match ODI series at floodlit Bangabandhu National Stadium Friday

4.title: 3rd ODI
4.statusText: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 62 balls remaining)

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start
